attributes.action: ensure that his E-Petitions rejection team is equipped with a dictionary and/or spell checker
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To have a petition concerned with illiteracy caused by falling standards of education rejected is bad enough. To see that the reason for rejection - "Intended to be humourous" - itself includes a misspelling is simply rubbing salt in the wounds.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
